summary: Georgette lives alone, works as a long-haul aircraft cleaner and has never won anything significant but her big break comes when she wins a luxury stay on the Reunion Island. She chooses to go with her friend Lydie, a native of the island.
cast: Pierre Mondy|Charlotte Kady|Bernard Yerlès|Vanille Attié|Lucien Jean-Baptiste|Fabien Béhar|Vincent Guillaud|René Sida|Julie Enilorac|Laurence Roustandjee|Valika M'Bossa|Thierry Salimina|Dominique Carrère|Karen Dardelin|Danielle Courtois|Stephane Celimon|Harly Rajaobelyna|Harry Payet|Romuald Grivet|Jacques Gallo|Magali Rosenzweig|Claire Pataut|Brigitte Barilley|Pierre Vallet|Marie Montoya|Désirée Olmi|Nicolas Robillard|Lucie Robillard|Alain Keit|Marilou Robillard|Guillaume Briat
title: Le roman de Georgette
